div.head: ¶ A daylye prayer to be sayde before the Lesson.
div.p: OH eternall and most mercyfull God: whois word is the lyght vnto oure stappes, and the lanterne vnto oure fete. We moost humble beseche the, to illuminat our myndes, that we maye vnderstand the mysteries conteynyd in thy holye lawe. And into the same selfe thynge that we godlye vnderstond, we may be vertuouslye transformyd, so that of no parte, we offend thy hyghe maiestie, through oure sauiour Jesus Christ▪ So be it.
